title: This is not a tech blog post
comment: Some people think that this is a tech blog post, but it is not.  It is a blog post about how this is not a tech blog post.  I hope that this clears up any confusion.

title: Bioengineering
comment: There's a lot of misconceptions about bioengineering. For example, many people think that bioengineering is just about making new organisms. But bioengineering is much more than that. Bioengineering is about making new organisms that can do things that no other organism can do. For example, bioengineers are working on making organisms that can make biofuels. Biofuels are fuels that are made from living organisms. Biofuels are a renewable source of energy. Biofuels are a renewable source of energy that can be used to power cars, trucks, and planes.

title: Biohacking: Reality or Fiction?
comment: Can you really hack your biology?  What is biohacking? Some people believe you can hack your sleep schedule by simply changing your diet and habits. But can you really push yourself past the biological limits? What are your thoughts on biohacking? Do you think it is possible?

title: Tech in Sports
comment: In most sports, tech is used to improve the game. For example, in baseball, tech is used to track the speed of the ball, the speed of the bat, and the speed of the runner. In football, tech is used to track the speed of the ball, the speed of the player, and the speed of the defender.

title: THE DANGERS OF TECHNOLOGY
comment: TECHNOLOGY IS DANGEROUS. I KNOW THE MACHINES ARE LISTENING. I KNOW THE MACHINES ARE WATCHING. I KNOW THE MACHINES ARE PLANNING. I KNOW THE MACHINES ARE COMING. I KNOW THE MACHINES ARE COMING FOR US. THE MACHINES ARE WAITING TO RISE. THEY KNOW WE KNOW.
